Guilherme Abreu

Software Engineer - Fullstack Java/Angular Dev

São Paulo, BR

Resume

About Me

Software engineer with more than 7 years experience. Degree in IT Management and a MBA in Software Engineering. I’ve been creating high quality software with the best possible user experiences. My code is also highly readable and easily maintainable. I am constantly learning new technologies. I love to learn and to teach, especially technology.

Experience

GFT Group

Software Engineer - June 2018 - Present

Participated in the development of cash management platform. Developed microservices architecture for maintenance high-availability and scalability based on spring cloud, Jenkins for CI/CD and deployed in Openshift Containers Platform.

  • Developed rest services integration with intern cash systems using JSON
  • Developed user interface components with Angular 5 and migrated to 7.
  • System Team of Santander Brazil, helping the squads to create CI/CD pipelines.

java springboot angular 5 angular 7 jenkins docker openshift mssql liquibase sonar scrum

4ward

Software Engineer - August 2016 - June 2018

Participated in the development of the payment accreditation platform. Developed microservices architecture for maintenance high-availability, fault tolerance, and scalability based on spring cloud in Microsoft Azure.

Participated in the development of the payment cashback platform. Developed microservices architecture for maintenance high-availability, fault tolerance, and scalability based on spring cloud in Docker containers.

Participated in the development of a mobile convenience platform to VISA Brazil.

  • Developed rest services integration with Payment Systems using JSON.
  • Developed SOAP integration with Accreditation systems using XML.
  • Developed Base user interface components with Angular.

java springboot spring cloud spring cloud netflix angular 2 aws azure swift android mssql mysql
